name: Shaddoll Zefracore
text:
[ MONSTER EFFECT ]
If this card is Pendulum Summoned or sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Zefra" card in your Pendulum Zone, except "Shaddoll Zefracore"; Special Summon it.
You can only use this effect of "Shaddoll Zefracore" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
[ PENDULUM EFFECT ]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shaddoll" and "Zefra" monsters.
This effect cannot be negated.
